properties.description: Title of image.
properties.title: Title

properties.description: Select a role from this vocabulary - http://id.loc.gov/vocabulary/relators.html - e.g. Artist, Creator, Designer, Engraver, Illustrator, Photographer, Printmaker, etc.
properties.title: Role

properties.description: Dates associated with this name.
properties.title: Dates

properties.description: The named person's culture.
properties.title: Culture

properties.description: A term that best describes the genre of the image. A excellent source for terms is the Thesaurus for Graphic Materials from the Library of Congress - http://www.loc.gov/pictures/collection/tgm/
properties.title: Genre

properties.description: The date the object was created/issued/published. Use the format YYYY-MM-DD.
properties.title: Date Issued

properties.description:
The identifying number and/or name assigned to the state or edition of a work that exists in more than one form and the placement of that work in the context of prior or later issuances of multiples of the same work.
For published volumes, such as books, portfolios, series, or sets, the edition is usually expressed as a number in relation to other editions printed. In other cases, a scholar may have identified a series of editions, which have then been numbered sequentially. An state or edition may also be identified by a name or phrase.
properties.title: State/Edition

properties.description: Number of known states , known editions, or number of impressions in an edition.
properties.title: Count

properties.description: Select a language from iso639-2b vocabulary: http://www.loc.gov/standards/iso639-2/php/code_list.php
properties.title: Language

properties.description: A designation of a particular physical presentation of a resource, including the physical form or medium of material for a resource.
properties.title: Form

properties.description: Enter the object's measurements (length x width for 2D objects, length x width x height for 3D objects, etc.)
properties.title: Measurements

properties.description: The substance of which the work or image is composed.
properties.title: Material/medium

properties.description: The physical condition of the object.
properties.title: Condition

properties.description: All marks or written words added to the object at the time of production or in its subsequent history, including signatures, dates, dedications, texts, and colophons, as well as marks, such as the stamps of silversmiths, publishers, or printers.
properties.title: Inscription

properties.description: Use LCSH for Subject entries where possible.
properties.title: Subject

properties.description: The name of the culture, people, or adjectival form of a country name from the work originates, or the cultural context with which it has been associated.
properties.title: Cultural Context

properties.description: Name of a country, i.e. a political entity considered a country.
properties.title: Country

properties.description: Includes first order political divisions called provinces within a country, e.g. in Canada.
properties.title: Province

properties.description: Includes regions that have status as a jurisdiction, usually incorporating more than one first level jurisdiction.
properties.title: Region

properties.description: Name of the largest local administrative unit in various countries, e.g. England.
properties.title: County

properties.description: Name of an inhabited place incorporated as a city, town, etc.
properties.title: City

properties.description: Name of a smaller unit within a populated place, e.g., neighborhoods, parks, or streets.
properties.title: City Section

properties.description: Contains a statement of coordinates covered by the resource.
properties.title: Coordinates

properties.description: If a non-personal name, enter the name here.
properties.title: Corporate name

properties.description: Specific information used to locate a resource within a collection, such as the name or code of an institution/repository, and perhaps subcollection.
properties.title: Physical location

properties.description: If your institution holds a physical copy/original, enter a shelving reference here.
properties.title: Shelf locator

properties.description: A URI to an appropriate statement from Rightsstatements.org. View details at http://rightsstatements.org

options.index: NO COPYRIGHT - OTHER KNOWN LEGAL RESTRICTIONS
IN COPYRIGHT - RIGHTS-HOLDER(S) UNLOCATABLE OR UNIDENTIFIABLE

properties.title: Rights Statement

properties.description: Additional information about the use and reproduction of the resource, including links to copyright information pages.
properties.title: Use and Reproduction

create.value: <accessCondition type="use and reproduction" displayLabel="Creative Commons license">%value%</accessCondition>
